ygData.subject: Re: Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: well you can do both as any class, but you must have a good faction with them thou... did them both as a Magician to improve faction with them just kill a few
ygData.messageBody:
well you can do both as any class, but you must have a good faction with
them thou...
did them both as a Magician

to improve faction with them just kill a few poachers
